Emma Spielfogel is the Senior Research Data & Report Analyst for the [California Teachers Study](https://www.calteachersstudy.org) at City of Hope National Medical Center. When not innovating new ways to transform and visualize data, Emma enjoys taking long walks and doing crosswords.
